inclusion.criterion: Histopathology of amyloidosis or light chain deposition disease
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: amyloidosis (involvement of lungs, tongue, bladder, heart)

inclusion.criterion: Demonstrate measurable disease as defined by one or more of the following:
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Serum monoclonal protein ≥ 0.5 g/dL by serum electrophoresis

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0, 1, or 2
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching x 2 days

inclusion.criterion: Patients had at least one prior regimen consisting of at least 1 cycle
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Initially treated with melphalan and prednisone, followed by VAD regimen, and autologous stem cell transplant

inclusion.criterion: Ability to provide written informed consent obtained prior to participation in the study and any related procedures being performed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must meet the following laboratory criteria:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Calculated creatinine clearance (CrCl) greater than or equal to 30 mL/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aspartate transaminase (AST) and alanine transaminase (ALT) ≤ 2.5 x upper limit of normal (ULN)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients meeting the criteria for symptomatic MM:
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction within 6 months prior to enrollment or has New York Heart Association (NYHA) Class III or IV heart failure uncontrolled angina, severe uncontrolled ventricular arrhythmias, or electrocardiographic evidence of acute ischemia or active conduction system abnormalities
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with N-terminal (NT)-proBNP ≥ 1800nb/L or B-type natriuretic peptide (BNP) ≥ 400 ng/L, abnormal cardiac troponin T (cTnT) or cardiac troponin l (cTnI)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has received other investigational drugs within 14 days prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met
